name: place
title: Place
description: Area with definite or indefinite boundaries or a portion of space which has a name in an area.

country.title: Country
country.description: A country is a region that is identified as a distinct entity in political geography.

region.title: Region
region.description: An administrative division, unit, entity, area or region, also referred to as a subnational entity, constituent unit, or country subdivision, is a portion of a country or other region delineated for the purpose of administration.

locality.title: Locality
locality.description: Locality a city, town, village, or other agglomeration of buildings where people live and work.
